org.apache.flink.runtime.resourcemanager

类 ResourceManager<WorkerType extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.RpcEndpoint
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.FencedRpcEndpoint<ResourceManagerId>
        • org.apache.flink.runtime.resourcemanager.ResourceManager<WorkerType>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    LeaderContender, ResourceManagerGateway, FencedRpcGateway<ResourceManagerId>, RpcGateway
    直接已知子类:
    MesosResourceManager, StandaloneResourceManager, YarnResourceManager

    public abstract class ResourceManager<WorkerType extends java.io.Serializable>
extends FencedRpcEndpoint<ResourceManagerId>
implements ResourceManagerGateway, LeaderContender
    ResourceManager implementation. The resource manager is responsible for resource de-/allocation and bookkeeping.

    It offers the following methods as part of its rpc interface to interact with him remotely:

    • registerJobManager(JobMasterId, ResourceID, String, JobID, Time) registers a JobMaster at the resource manager
    • requestSlot(JobMasterId, SlotRequest, Time) requests a slot from the resource manager

    • 方法详细资料

      • start

        public void start()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: RpcEndpoint
        Starts the rpc endpoint. This tells the underlying rpc server that the rpc endpoint is ready to process remote procedure calls. IMPORTANT: Whenever you override this method, call the parent implementation to enable rpc processing. It is advised to make the parent call last.
        覆盖:
        start 在类中 RpcEndpoint
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - indicating that something went wrong while starting the RPC endpoint

      • postStop

        public void postStop()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: RpcEndpoint
        User overridable callback.

        This method is called when the RpcEndpoint is being shut down. The method is guaranteed to be executed in the main thread context and can be used to clean up internal state. IMPORTANT: This method should never be called directly by the user.

        覆盖:
        postStop 在类中 RpcEndpoint
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs. The exception is returned as result of the termination future.

      • registerJobManager

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<RegistrationResponse> registerJobManager(JobMasterId jobMasterId,
                                                                                       ResourceID jobManagerResourceId,
                                                                                       java.lang.String jobManagerAddress,
                                                                                       JobID jobId,
                                                                                       Time timeout)
        从接口复制的说明: ResourceManagerGateway
        Register a JobMaster at the resource manager.
        指定者:
        registerJobManager 在接口中 ResourceManagerGateway
        参数:
        jobMasterId - The fencing token for the JobMaster leader
        jobManagerResourceId - The resource ID of the JobMaster that registers
        jobManagerAddress - The address of the JobMaster that registers
        jobId - The Job ID of the JobMaster that registers
        timeout - Timeout for the future to complete
        返回:
        Future registration response

      • registerTaskExecutor

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<RegistrationResponse> registerTaskExecutor(java.lang.String taskExecutorAddress,
                                                                                         ResourceID taskExecutorResourceId,
                                                                                         SlotReport slotReport,
                                                                                         Time timeout)
        从接口复制的说明: ResourceManagerGateway
        Register a TaskExecutor at the resource manager.
        指定者:
        registerTaskExecutor 在接口中 ResourceManagerGateway
        参数:
        taskExecutorAddress - The address of the TaskExecutor that registers
        taskExecutorResourceId - The resource ID of the TaskExecutor that registers
        slotReport - The slot report containing free and allocated task slots
        timeout - The timeout for the response.
        返回:
        The future to the response by the ResourceManager.

                                                       java.lang.String jobManagerAddress,
                                                       ResourceID jobManagerResourceId)
        Registers a new JobMaster.
        参数:
        jobMasterGateway - to communicate with the registering JobMaster
        jobId - of the job for which the JobMaster is responsible
        jobManagerAddress - address of the JobMaster
        jobManagerResourceId - ResourceID of the JobMaster
        返回:
        RegistrationResponse

        参数:

        taskExecutorResourceId - ResourceID of the TaskExecutor

      • closeJobManagerConnection

        protected void closeJobManagerConnection(JobID jobId,
                                         java.lang.Exception cause)
        This method should be called by the framework once it detects that a currently registered job manager has failed.
        参数:
        jobId - identifying the job whose leader shall be disconnected.
        cause - The exception which cause the JobManager failed.

        protected void closeTaskManagerConnection(ResourceID resourceID,
                                          java.lang.Exception cause)
        This method should be called by the framework once it detects that a currently registered task executor has failed.
        参数:
        resourceID - Id of the TaskManager that has failed.
        cause - The exception which cause the TaskManager failed.

      • initialize

        protected abstract void initialize()
                            throws ResourceManagerException
        Initializes the framework specific components.
        抛出:
        ResourceManagerException - which occurs during initialization and causes the resource manager to fail.

      • shutDownApplication

        protected abstract void shutDownApplication(ApplicationStatus finalStatus,
                                            java.lang.String optionalDiagnostics)
                                     throws ResourceManagerException
        The framework specific code for shutting down the application. This should report the application's final status and shut down the resource manager cleanly.

        This method also needs to make sure all pending containers that are not registered yet are returned.

        参数:
        finalStatus - The application status to report.
        optionalDiagnostics - An optional diagnostics message.
        抛出:
        ResourceManagerException - if the application could not be shut down.

      • startNewWorker

        @VisibleForTesting
public abstract void startNewWorker(ResourceProfile resourceProfile)
        Allocates a resource using the resource profile.
        参数:
        resourceProfile - The resource description

        protected abstract WorkerType workerStarted(ResourceID resourceID)
        Callback when a worker was started.
        参数:
        resourceID - The worker resource id

      • stopWorker

        public abstract boolean stopWorker(ResourceID resourceID)
        Stops the given worker.
        参数:
        resourceID - identifying the worker to be stopped
        返回:
        True if the worker was stopped, otherwise false
